titleInfo.title: Biographies in christian fundamentalist milieus and organizations: Report to the Enquete Commission of the 13th German Parliament on "So-called Sects and Psychogroups", results of the research project on "Drop-outs, converts and believers: contrasting biographical analyses of why individuals join, have a career and stay in, or leave religious/ ideological contexts or groups"

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Streib, H. (2000). Biographies in christian fundamentalist milieus and organizations: Report to the Enquete Commission of the 13th German Parliament on "So-called Sects and Psychogroups", results of the research project on "Drop-outs, converts and believers: contrasting biographical analyses of why individuals join, have a career and stay in, or leave religious/ ideological contexts or groups" (Beiträge zur biographischen Religionsforschung ; 1). Bielefeld: Universität.
